testsuite.name: login.To test flight application login screen.

testcase.classname: login.To test flight application login screen.
testcase.name: Validate login with invalid credential

failure.message: Expected: Find a Flight:Mercury Tours, Actual: Sign-on: Mercury Tours

testcase.failure: Failing step: Then validate landing page "Find a Flight:Mercury Tours" ... failed in 0.011s Location: features/login.feature:7 Assertion Failed: Expected: Find a Flight:Mercury Tours, Actual: Sign-on: Mercury Tours
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Validate login with invalid credential Given open the url "http://newtours.demoaut.com/" ... passed in 2.139s Then validate landing page "Welcome: Mercury Tours" ... passed in 0.015s When login with username "mercury" and password "merucry" ... passed in 2.331s Then validate landing page "Find a Flight:Mercury Tours" ... failed in 0.011s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
